description: This table holds diagnosis codes and qualifiers for a charge that are not from the primary code set configured in the system.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALT_DIAG_CODE_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis codes that are not from the primary diagnosis code set configured for your facility.

columns.name: ALT_DIAG_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The diagnosis code qualifiers that are not from the primary diagnosis code set configured for your facility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
